animeTitle: Tottoko Hamtarou Movie 1: Ham-Ham Land Daibouken
animeDescription: It's Laura's birthday, and Laura isn't paying much attention to him. Hamtaro then went with the ham-hams to ham ham land. Hamtaro is searching for the magic sunflower seed, but, he will have to battle Maou-hamu for it.
animeStaff: [['Dezaki Osamu', ['Director', 'Storyboard']], ['Watanabe Cheru', ['Theme Song Arrangement']], ['Yamanaka Junko', ['Character Design']], ['Peythieu Philippe', ['ADR Director']]]
